summary: Mod replaces the Blades Armor and adds its ebony version.
descriptionHtml:
Russian and English version, simply select the ESP.

Mod replaces the Blades Armor and adds its ebony version.
Ebony Blades Armor is created by reforging Blades Armor in the smithing forge. Reforging requires the perk "EbonySmithing".

In the mod I used native meshes and textures with the addition of some meshes and textures from third-party mods. These are the trousers from "[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64377/?][color=#3d85c6]Newmiller elven set[/color][/url]", boots and gloves from "[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27308/?][color=#3d85c6]Neo - Tina from DOA by Nausicaa[/color][/url]".

In the mod I used bodies from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE-[/url].

Requirements:
1. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37481/?][color=#3d85c6]NetImmerse Override[/color][/url] or [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?][color=#3d85c6]Racemenu[/color][/url].
2. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70581/?][color=#3d85c6]NiOverride High Heels Fixes[/color][/url].
3. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]HDT Physics Extensions[/url].

Installation:
[u][color=#f1c232]Be sure to select only one ESP, RU or EN.[/color][/u]
Manually (copy the contents of the archive in the Data folder) or through the mod managers.
author: kelamor
